answers.answer: Take a test. There are some really good ones out there or you can go to the doctor and ask for a blood test and know for sure. Good Luck
There is a chance the spotting could have been implantation bleeding. It isn't too early to test so I would buy a good home pregnancy test and use first morning urine. It can't hurt :)

question: Hello I'm new to this site and I have a question....I'm 41 and have diabetes,sleep apnea,highblood pressure,low iron and obese. I usually have my cycle on a regular but until April 13th i spotted and then it stopped, my last regular cycle was March 23 and lasted 5 days. My question is could I be pregnate?
title: Could I be Pregnate
